title: Disapearing Skin Shard
body: I had a skin shard for astronaut paid the 1050 essence and got the permanent skin shard but it that wasn't working, I restarted the client multiple times like it asked but it never worked. Now it disappeared all together, any help? Thanks

replies.body: Whelp, that's some heckin' crap ain't it? I'm not entirely sure what went wrong there, but I've gone ahead and reverted those AstroNautilus transactions so that you can give it another go. Let me know if it still doesn't work this time!

Thank you so much for the quick answer and help! It worked this time thankfully, though I did have to try it twice  and restarting the client, not that I'm complaining I just want you to know what I did just in case it happens to someone else. Thanks again!
